snippet: The Mets have been near the major league lead in injuries the past few seasons, and if spring training is any indication, this year will be no different.
abstract: New York Mets have been near the major league lead in injuries the past few seasons, and if spring training is any indication, this year will be no different.
lead_paragraph: The Mets have been near the major league lead in injuries the past few seasons, and if spring training is any indication, this year will be no different.

headline.seo: Mets Off to Fast Start in the Injury Race
